mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ITEM_DTL ( BAR_CODE, ITEM_NM, ITEM_TYPE_CD, ITEM_TYPE_NM, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{BAR_CODE}, #{ITEM_NM}, #{ITEM_TYPE_CD}, #{ITEM_TYPE_NM}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ITEM_TYPE_CD = #{ITEM_TYPE_CD}, ITEM_TYPE_NM = #{ITEM_TYPE_NM}, UPDATE_DT = NOW()
